participant_1.background:
I like canning and whittling.
To stay in shape , i chase cheetahs at the zoo.

I eat exclusively meat.

content.text: Hi, I'm [name]. I like to can and whittle. I also like to eat exclusively meat.
Hi, I'm [name]. I like to remodel homes, go hunting, and shoot a bow. My favorite holiday is Halloween.
That's cool. I've never been hunting, but I've always thought it looked like fun.
It's a lot of fun. I love being outdoors and being active.
I agree. I love being outside too. I like to go hiking and biking.
Me too! I love exploring new places.
I love that too. It's so much fun to see new things and meet new people.
I agree. I love learning about new cultures and traditions.
Me too. I think it's so important to be open-minded and to try new things.
I agree. I think that's the best way to live life.
I agree. I'm glad we agree on something!
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
